org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.transformation

Class Transformation<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge,LG extends BaseGraph<G,V,E,LG,GC>,GC extends BaseGraphCollection<G,V,E,LG,GC>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.transformation.Transformation<G,V,E,LG,GC>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - The graph head type.
    V - The vertex type.
    E - The edge type.
    LG - The type of the graph.
    GC - The type of the graph collection.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operator, UnaryBaseGraphToBaseGraphOperator<LG>, UnaryBaseGraphToValueOperator<LG,LG>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplyTransformation

    public class Transformation<G extends GraphHead,V extends Vertex,E extends Edge,LG extends BaseGraph<G,V,E,LG,GC>,GC extends BaseGraphCollection<G,V,E,LG,GC>>
extends Object
implements UnaryBaseGraphToBaseGraphOperator<LG>
    The modification operators is a unary graph operator that takes a base graph as input and applies user defined modification functions on the elements of that graph as well as on its graph head. The identity of the elements is preserved.
